csvFields.name: ocurrence_datetime
csvFields.formula: data['ocurrence_datetime'] = data.arrival_datetime - pd.to_timedelta(data.voyage_time_hs, unit='h') - pd.to_timedelta(data.manoeuvring_hours, unit='h')
